message.body: Saw your fb post. Didn't know if you were still down the street. if you were I would stop by to say hi.
Not anymore, but I'll be at that place a LOT over the next couple of months. Next Sunday morning for example :)
Yay! I like that place. Michael and I used to bowl there a lot.
Though I think out was called geris lanes then
Yeah, they renamed it last year I think. Though the old name is still on the building
What do you have going on this afternoon? Want to do something?
Nothing going on this afternoon... But I'm going to whyy at 8 for downton abby premier. I would come in early but I have to pick my cousin up and I think
it would be silly to keep driving to and from the city.
